generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings extending into the distance, indicating it is a road for vehicular traffic.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, visible with pedestrians and some barriers along the edge.
- building: On the left side of the road, there are buildings with scaffolding, indicating construction or renovation.
- fence: A white and red striped fence is visible along the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including traffic light poles and streetlight poles.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, showing green lights.
- traffic sign: A circular "No Parking" sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and greenery along both sides of the road, especially on the right side.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible along the sidewalks and between the road and the buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Several people are visible on the right sidewalk, standing and talking.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a yellow taxi and a dark-colored van on the right.
- truck: A white truck is visible in the distance, driving away from the camera.
- bicycle: A person is riding a bicycle on the left sidewalk.
